info.name: Seq_ind_tot_fam_tot_expR3_singVsmultiMagi
info.description:
This collection has individual total  primary and spouse, family total primary and spouse and LTC primary and spouse.
we ae using the output(total ABD,ABCD,ABFD,ABGD & ABND) from indivdual total and family total and calling it in the expense present value and fund with investments(get savings).
 LTC output(adultcare, home care,assisted care and nursing care) also we are calling in expense present value to project the expense.

request.description:
This collection has individual total primary and spouse and family total expense API, expense present value, fund with investments(get savings), and LTC APIs.
In the pre-req, this test, sets global variables for all downstream APIs.
In the tests, we calculate totalABD,ABCD,ABFD,ABGD,ABND,partB and partD premium surcharges.
We also set 'from year' and 'to year'.
